text: <@U26BLKGE4> *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-modules|Getting started with Modules>* is really helpful, thanks!

Hello All.
I’m having speed issues in my CMS site on pages that I have HubSpot forms added with recaptcha. These are being shown in semrush and in <http://web.dev|web.dev>. I’m trying to improve the speed but I cannot deal with that part of it.
I know this has been discuss by other people before, and I even see a topic but with no solution. Has anyone found any way to prevent these warnings from showing and improve the speed while keeping the recatpcha on the HubSpot form?
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Lead-Capture-Tools/Recaptcha-in-HS-forms-slowing-down-website-speed/m-p/415705>
I am looking for a way to export all engagements when a deal closes. Is this possible?

is there something equivalent in HubSpot to a cache/index clear? assuming even that's the issue. some of our changes are taking up to a minute to show up. during the day, some are fast, some are super slow

For individual users, there’s ?hsCacheBuster=12345 (or any number). For individual pages, you could throw a `request` variable somewhere in the template, but it’s not advised. There is no option for the entire site that I know of.
that's super helpful. you are a mountain of knowledge. thank you as always
Hi All.Today I have joined the HubSpot Developer slack Channel.
Has anyone got issue in implementing Standard:Orginal  comments to buyers functionality to customized quote templates?
